page.title: 14THE SCHOOL
page.content: Our school was built in 1865. It is made of stone. Since 1865 the school has had a lot of changes made. We haven't got very many people in our school only 42 chidren and two fulltime teachers. The headteacher of our school is called Mr.Roe. The infant teacher is called Mrs. Attewell. We have got three supply teachers: Mrs. Biddulph, Mrs. Scambler and sometimes Mrs. Leat. We have two school gardens and one school swimming pool (Yipee!!). The swimming pool is only 7.45 m long and 5 metres wide. We've got two playgrounds. Our biggest playground is 47 metres long and 16 metres wide. Our little playground is a funny shape but all together it measures 127 metres.
